name: Bone to Pick (Brackeys 2022.1 Submission)
description:
Bone To Pick

-------------------------------

Pesky skeletons have been creating havoc by generating props all over the land! As the resident skeleton exterminator, you must enter the anomalies they have created and put an end to their mischief! 

The skeletons have not made it easy however, they are disguising themselves as the props! Using your keen eye and your trusty ghost detecting window, find the skeletons as fast as you can. The clock is ticking!

-------------------------------

Controls:

WASD to move

Shift to sprint

Space to Jump

F to dash in air

--While in Ghost Zone--

E to place Ghost Viewer Window

Left Click to shoot

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Programming: 

Third person Character Controller by Unity, everything else by me!
